\\[4pt]
{\footnotesize Notes: MVE portfolios use tangency weights $b\propto \Sigma^{-1}\mu$ computed in-sample on the corresponding factor set. Volatility management scales by inverse lagged variance of the MVE portfolio and normalizes to match the unconditional standard deviation of the unmanaged MVE portfolio. Alphas are from $f^{MVE,\sigma}=\alpha+\beta f^{MVE}+\varepsilon$ with HC1 standard errors. Sharpe ratios are annualized. Appraisal ratio is annualized alpha divided by tracking error.}
